sectionText: The course will examine the current state of global health informatics from both a local and global perspective, including opportunities and challenges. Focus will be placed on the transition from paper-based records to electronic systems, with a particular emphasis on large international open-source initiatives and the use of mobile devices. Guest speakers will share their experiences with WHO, cell phone based education, and regulatory issues. No programming or statistical experience is required.  Meets with LIS 490 GHU, INFO 490 GHU and INFO 590 GHG.

meeting.buildingName: Grad Sch of Lib & Info Science
